page.title: 06A PENTON HOUSEWIFE
page.content: Mrs. Isherwood is a Penton housewife. In the morning she gets up to feed her two cats. Then she has her breakfast and gets ready to take her two children, a girl and a boy, to school. She likes living in Penton, and has been living here for about fifteen and a half years. Most days she goes into Andover to do her shopping. She has no actual paid job and spends her day in the house tidying up or in the garden or entertaining visitors that might drop in. She has a fairly biggish house and one car. During the afternoon she goes to the local tennis club, after this she goes back home, gets in the car and drives away to collect her children from school. In the evening she goes to the regular Friends of Andover Museum meeting. Mrs. Isherwood lives at Chalcot, Chalkcroft Lane, Penton Mewsey.
